roleset.name: perform a lobotomy on
roleset.note: LOBOTOMIZE-V NOTES: Created by Claire (from lobotomize.01-v)

example.name: Metaphorical lobotomy
example.text: [The Anonymous]-1 at 2:52 PM, albeit *PRO*-1 lobotomized *-1 by the iron triangle's propaganda, hit upon a major point that we should all be aware of.
